messages.content: I'm incredibly proud of my record, getting more money for our NHS, passing a law to enable banning of legal highs, delivering an additional £23.3 million each year for local schools, to help our children get the best possible start in life.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protect our NHS and schools from extreme cuts.

issues.education: Delivered an additional £23.3 million each year for local schools.
issues.health: Getting more money for our NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm incredibly proud of my record, getting more money for our NHS, passing a law to enable banning of legal highs, delivering an additional £23.3 million each year for local schools, to help our children get the best possible start in life.

politicalExperience.achievements: Passing a law to enable banning of legal highs, delivering an additional £23.3 million each year for local schools.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet contains personal election statements from Julian Huppert outlining achievements and positions on important issues such as NHS funding and education.
